CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Fail'), IMAGE("/resource/1433851751000/numm__progressbar_60", "Chargement du document",10,100), IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Completed'), IMAGE("/resource/1433852763000/numm__progressbar_100", "Chargement du document",10,100), IMAGE('/resource/1433850533000/numm__progressbar_20', 'Test', 10, ( IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Server Request'),0,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Process Data'),0.25 , IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Document Creation'),0.5 ,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Save Document'),0.75,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Completed'),1,0))))) * 100 )) & IMAGE('/resource/1433850553000/numm__progressbar_40', 'Test', 10, (100 - IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Server Request'),0,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Process Data'),0.25 , IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Document Creation'),0.5 ,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Save Document'),0.75,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Completed'),1,0))))) * 100 )))) & ' ' & TEXT (IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Server Request'),0,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Process Data'),0.25 , IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Document Creation'),0.5 ,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Save Document'),0.75,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Completed'),1,0))))) * 100) & '%'+BR()+IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Server Request'),"Demande d'édition en cours",IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Process Data'),'Extraction des données en cours' , IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Document Creation'),'Génération du document en cours' ,IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Save Document'),'Téléchargement en cours',IF( ISPICKVAL(numm__Status__c, 'Completed'),'Téléchargement terminé','Erreur')))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Actualiser la page pour voir les progrès.
CustomField.label: Statut
